instructions: Connect the PROG port to your PC using a micro USB cable.
Download imx-boot.bin from the device repository and use imx uuu to boot this binary on the IOT-GATE-IMX8PLUS.
Once imx-boot is running on the IOT-GATE-IMX8PLUS, the eMMC will be exposed as a USB MASS STORAGE device on your PC.
Write the image downloaded from balena cloud to the device. We recommend using Etcher.
After flashing is completed, disconnect the micro USB cable from the PROG port and reboot the device.
